Desc.entry: Provides bursaries for unemployed part-time undergraduate students doing less than 60 credit points/50% of a full-time course in one academic year. Also provides bursaries for students who are participating in sport at a national level and studying a full-time or a part-time undergraduate course. Participants must have been residing in South Yorkshire or North Derbyshire for 2 years immediately preceding the course. Priority for consideration is given to single parents and disabled students.

ContactName.entry: Adele Evans/Di Morello, Head of Student Finance Centre
